mapper.select:
SELECT u.id, u.username AS username, u.id AS userId, u.nick_name AS nickName, u.enable AS status, u.password AS password, u.group_id AS groupId, r.name AS roleName, g.`name` as groupName, r.id AS roleId, g.parent_id AS parentGroupId, u.err_pwd_count AS errPwdCount, g.city_code AS cityCode, g.company_lng AS cityLng, g.company_lat AS cityLat FROM u LEFT JOIN ns_roles r ON u.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN d_group g ON u.group_id = g.id WHERE 1=1
AND u.nick_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{user.nickName},'%')
AND u.username = #{user.username}
ORDER BY u.enable DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( username, nick_name, password, `enable`, role_id, group_id, creator, updater ) VALUE ( #{username}, #{nickName}, #{password}, #{status}, #{roleId}, #{groupId}, #{creator}, #{updater} )
mapper.select: SELECT u.username AS username, u.id AS id, u.nick_name AS nickName, u.enable AS status, u.password AS password, u.group_id AS groupId, r.name AS roleName, g.`name` as groupName, r.id AS roleId, u.err_pwd_count AS errPwdCount FROM u LEFT JOIN ns_roles r ON u.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN d_group g ON u.group_id = g.id WHERE u.id = #{value}
